00024 #include "MultipleCircularAlignment.h"
00025 #include "MultipleMetaCircularAlignment.h"
00026 #include "ScoringModel.h"
00027 #include "ExtendedFasta.h"
00028 #include "Output.h"
00029 #include "VertebrateMitochondrialGenomeAlphabet.h"
00030 #include <Seq/alphabets>
00031 #include <iostream>
00032 #include <fstream>
00033 
00034 int main(int args, char* argv[])
00035   {
00036     //Check for correct call
00037     if (args < 4)
00038       {
00039         std::cerr<< "Usage: Circal++ Input.fasta  XX.score Output.fasta"
00040             << std::endl;;
00041         exit(-1);
00042       }
00043     std::string seqFilename = argv[1];
00044     std::string scoreFilename = argv[2];
00045     std::string outFilename = argv[3];
00046 
00047     //Check for Sequence File Existence
00048     if (!bpp::FileTools::fileExists(seqFilename))
00049       {
00050         std::cerr << "Can't open Sequence File "<< seqFilename << std::endl;
00051         exit(-1);
00052       }
00053 
00054     //Check for Scoring File Existence
00055     if (!bpp::FileTools::fileExists(scoreFilename))
00056       {
00057         std::cerr << "Can't open Scoring File "<< scoreFilename << std::endl;
00058         exit(-1);
00059       }
00060 
00061     //Initialize FASTA Reader
00062     //Circal::ExtendedFasta seqReader;
00063     bpp::Fasta seqReader;
00064 
00065     bpp::Fasta seqWriter;
00066 
00067     //Init Scoring Model
00068     Circal::ScoringModel* scoreM = new Circal::ScoringModel(scoreFilename);
00069 
00070     //Use Self defined Alphabet
00071     //    Circal::VertebrateMitochondrialGenomeAlphabet * alpha =
00072     //        new Circal::VertebrateMitochondrialGenomeAlphabet(scoreM);
00073 
00074     bpp::DNA* alpha = new bpp::DNA();
00075 
00076     //Container for read sequences
00077     bpp::VectorSequenceContainer* sequences;
00078 
00079     //Try parsing the file for FASTA
00080     try
00081       {
00082         sequences = dynamic_cast<bpp::VectorSequenceContainer*>
00083         (seqReader.read(seqFilename,alpha));
00084       }
00085     catch(bpp::Exception &e)
00086       {
00087         std::cerr << "Invalid File Format!" << std::endl;
00088         std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00089         //Clean up
00090         delete alpha;
00091         exit(-1);
00092       }
00093 
00094     Circal::MultipleMetaCircularAlignment* circal;
00095 
00096     //Create Multiple Circular Alignment
00097     std::cerr << "Meta circul√§res Alignment" << std::endl;
00098     circal = new Circal::MultipleMetaCircularAlignment(sequences,scoreM);
00099 
00100     Circal::Output* foo = new Circal::Output();
00101     seqWriter.write(outFilename, *dynamic_cast<bpp::SequenceContainer*>(circal));
00102 
00103     std::cout << foo->TCoffeeLibFormat(circal);
00104 
00105     //Clean up
00106     delete alpha;
00107     delete sequences;
00108     return 0;
00109   }
